component.name: ThemedIconButton
component.script:
Sub Init()
m.background = m.top.findNode("background") m.button = m.top.findNode("button") m.origBlendColor = m.button.getChild(0).blendColor
m.button.showFocusFootprint = true m.button.iconUri="" m.button.focusedIconUri=""
m.top.observeFieldScoped("size", "OnMetricsChanged") m.top.observeFieldScoped("showBackground", "OnMetricsChanged") m.top.observeFieldScoped("focusedChild", "FocusChanged")
m.global.observeFieldScoped("theme", "OnMetricsChanged")
m.top.observeFieldScoped("icon", "IconChanged")
End Sub
Sub OnMetricsChanged()
m.background.visible = m.top.showBackground m.background.width = m.top.size m.background.height = m.top.size
if m.top.showBackground then m.button.minWidth = m.top.size - 20 m.button.maxWidth = m.top.size - 20 m.button.height = m.top.size - 20 m.button.translation = [10, 10]
if m.button.hasFocus() then m.background.blendColor = m.global.theme.primary else m.background.blendColor = "0x3C3C3CFF" end if
m.button.getChild(0).blendColor = m.origBlendColor
else m.button.getChild(0).blendColor = m.global.theme.primary m.button.minWidth = m.top.size m.button.maxWidth = m.top.size m.button.height = m.top.size m.button.translation = [0, 0] end if
End Sub
Sub IconChanged()
m.button.focusBitmapUri = m.top.icon m.button.focusFootprintBitmapUri = m.top.icon OnMetricsChanged()
End Sub
Sub FocusChanged()
if m.top.hasFocus() then m.button.setFocus(true) OnMetricsChanged()
End Sub
